name: Dolphin Swim & Play! Game For Kids And Toddlers
name_original: Dolphin Swim & Play! Game For Kids And Toddlers
description:
Play and swim with a fun Dolphin!

My kids love dolphins and ocean animals, so I worked with them to make a simple, easy to play with 3D dolphin app. It has fun swimming, splashing, jumps, and stunts with lots of levels to play in.

•High resolution, interactive, 3D dolphin with jumps, races, and stunts!
•Easy, clear button controls for little fingers
•Race against turtles, whales, and sharks!
•Lots of fun levels and different game types to choose from!

Take your dolphin on a free swim, or race with other animals! Play challenging levels where you try to collect objects! Select your favorite game, from easy breezy to challenging in a 3D island map!

My kids love it, and we hope your kids love it, too!
